abstractText: A Nepalese concertina manuscript containing a Collection of dhāraṇīs, stotras and ritual texts such as the Vakrasaṃvarapūjāvidhinityakarma.
abstractShort: A Nepalese concertina manuscript containing a Collection of dhāraṇīs, stotras and ritual texts such as the Vakrasaṃvara
title: Collection of dhāraṇīs, stotras and ritual texts
